expo.name: Only2U
expo.description: Official Only2U app by Only2U Fashion Private Limited, delivering AI-powered fashion commerce.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Only2U needs access to your camera to take photos for your profile picture and to enable AI face swap previews that show you how products look on you.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Only2U needs access to your photo library to select photos for your profile picture, enable face swap previews, and allow product customization with AI technology.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Only2U needs permission to save your face swap results and personalized product images to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Only2U needs access to your microphone for recording videos and creating personalized content with products.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Only2U uses speech recognition to enable voice commands and improve accessibility for hands-free navigation and product search.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Only2U needs access to your contacts to help you connect with friends already using the app.
